select institution_associate.*, associate_institution.ins_name , associate_institution.ins_type, institution.ins_type institutionType, p10_address.address_id, p10_address.province, p10_address.city, p10_address.area, p10_address.information_address, p10_address.code -- institution.ins_principal_name from p10_institution_associate institution_associate LEFT JOIN p10_institution associate_institution ON associate_institution.ins_id = institution_associate.ins_associate_id LEFT JOIN p10_institution institution ON institution.ins_id = institution_associate.ins_id left join p10_address on p10_address.user_id = institution.ins_id and p10_address.type = 2 where institution.del_flag = '0'
AND institution_associate.ins_id = #{query.insId}

select institution_associate.associate_id, institution_associate.ins_id, institution_associate.ins_associate_id, institution_associate.associate_time, institution_associate.associate_status, institution_associate.associate_remark, institution.ins_name, institution.ins_type, p10_address.* from p10_institution_associate institution_associate LEFT JOIN p10_institution institution ON institution.ins_id = institution_associate.ins_associate_id LEFT JOIN p10_address ON p10_address.user_id = institution.ins_id and p10_address.type = 2 WHERE institution.del_flag = '0' AND institution_associate.associate_id = #{associateId}

SELECT p10_court.*, p10_institution_associate.ins_associate_id AS courtInsId FROM p10_institution_associate LEFT JOIN p10_institution ON p10_institution_associate.ins_associate_id = p10_institution.ins_id LEFT JOIN p10_relationship_authenticate ON p10_institution.ins_id = p10_relationship_authenticate.authenticate_id LEFT JOIN p10_court ON p10_relationship_authenticate.authenticate_goal_id = p10_court.court_id WHERE p10_institution_associate.ins_id = #{insId} AND p10_institution_associate.associate_status = 100 AND p10_institution.ins_type = 1500
AND p10_court.court_name like concat('%', #{courtName}, '%')
AND p10_institution_associate.ins_associate_id not in
#{item}
